domain.description: Required. The domain name to use for email addresses and calendar invites.

users.description: Required. A dictionary of users to generate data for. The key is the username, and the value is a list containing the user's full name and email prefix.

calendar.description: Optional. Settings for the calendar event generator.

months_to_generate.description: Optional. The number of months to generate events for.

num_events_range.description: Optional. A list containing the minimum and maximum number of events to generate per month.

location.description: Optional. The default location for events.

output_dir.description: Optional. The directory to save the generated .ics files.

shared_event_types.description: Optional. A list of event titles for meetings with multiple attendees.
value: Trade Negotiations with the Men of Dale
Scouring of the Shire Town Hall
Meeting of the Fellowship of the Ring
Council of the Heirs of Isildur
Paths of the Dead Maintenance Committee
Lost Tales of Gondolin Reading Group

solo_event_types.description: Optional. A list of event titles for events with a single attendee.
value: Studying the Red Book of Westmarch
Tending to the Gardens of Rivendell
Charting the Stars over the Anduin
Personal Time at the Mirror of Galadriel
Memorizing the Riddles in the Dark
Cataloging new plants for the herbarium
Quiet Reflection at the Havens of Sirion
Studying the architecture of Minas Tirith
Drafting a new chapter for the Red Book
Inspecting the quality of Longbottom Leaf
A walk to the Old Mill
Studying maps of the Lonely Mountain
Preparing a draft of a new Shire law
A quiet pint at The Green Dragon
Visiting the tombs of the Kings
Reviewing the history of the Silmarils
Checking the cellars of Bag End
Feeding the swans of Dol Amroth
Updating the inventory of the Mathom-house
Composing a tune on the harp
A quiet walk along the banks of the Withywindle
Reading up on the history of Númenor

email.description: Optional. Settings for the email generator.

num_samples.description: Optional. The total number of emails to extract from the source file.

output_dir.description: Optional. The directory to save the generated .mbox files.

num_mbox_files.description: Optional. The number of .mbox files to split the emails into.

docs.description: Optional. Settings for the document generator.

num_files.description: Optional. The number of files to generate per user.

org_name.description: Optional. The name of the organization to use in the generated documents.

theme.description: Required. The theme to use for the generated documents.
theme.value: Financial services for Ents in Middle-earth

gemini_api_key.description: Optional. Your Gemini API key. If not provided, the script will check for the GEMINI_API_KEY environment variable.

roles.description: Optional. A list of roles to generate files for.

file_types.description: Optional. A list of file types to generate.

doc_types.description: Optional. A list of document types to generate.

sheet_types.description: Optional. A list of spreadsheet types to generate.

ppt_types.description: Optional. A list of presentation types to generate.

pdf_types.description: Optional. a list of PDF types to generate.
